title: Industrial Auction Site Interface
description: A premium, visually stunning UI template for an auction site with a modern, industrial aesthetic.

real_time: WebSocket connection for live bid updates

generation_hints: Implement real-time bid updates using WebSocket or polling
Use countdown timers with proper cleanup on unmount
Add optimistic UI updates for bid placement
Implement proper loading states during bid submission
Use Image component with next/image for auction item images
Add proper validation for bid amounts (minimum increment, reserve price)
Implement skeleton loaders for auction grid during data fetch
Use proper error boundaries for bid failures
Add proper currency formatting with Intl.NumberFormat
Implement filter/sort state with URL params for shareability
Add ARIA labels for bid controls and countdown timers
Use semantic HTML for auction listings (article, time elements)
Implement keyboard navigation for auction cards
Add visual indicators for ending soon auctions
Use toast notifications for bid confirmations and outbid alerts
Implement proper time zone handling for auction end times
